item.title: Case of a leaking timer in go
item.description: It was only an accident that I read a post on ArangoDB site and found the same leak in one of our projects at work. So this is going to be quite short, but nevertheless I want for have it in form of a blogpost. Here is how leak looked like: package main import ( "fmt" "runtime" "time" ) func main() { messags := make(chan string) for { select { case msg := <- messages: // do smth with msg fmt.
